messages.content: What is the purpose of A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes?
A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes are supporting nodes that integrate A8R8 with ComfyUI to enhance its functionality.
When was the Attention Couple nodes feature added to A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes?
The Attention Couple nodes feature was added to A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes on 2024/06/26.
What is the purpose of Attention Couple nodes in A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes?
Attention Couple nodes in A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes are used for regional prompting, allowing users to apply prompts to specific regions of an image.
How can you install A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes?
To install A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes, you need to checkout the repo under the 'ComfyUI > custom_nodes' directory or use the Comfy Manager. After that, start or restart ComfyUI to complete the installation.
What license is used for the relevant parts of the Attention Couple calculation and patch code in A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes?
The relevant parts of the Attention Couple calculation and patch code in A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes use the GPL-3.0 license.
Who are the creators credited for the original Attention Couple implementation that A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes is derived from?

The original Attention Couple implementation that A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes is derived from was created by laksjdjf (https://github.com/laksjdjf/cgem156-ComfyUI/tree/main/scripts/attention_couple) and Haoming02 (https://github.com/Haoming02/sd-forge-couple).
What is the relationship between A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes and ComfyUI?
A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes is an extension or custom node that integrates additional functionality, such as the Attention Couple nodes, into the ComfyUI application.
